booking_status_description: Indicates that the booking is received by the carrier
Indicates that the carrier requested a booking update from the shipper which is not received yet
Indicates that the shipper requested a booking update which is not confirmed yet
Indicates that the shipper requested an update to the confirmed booking which is not approved yet
Indicates that the booking is confirmed
Indicates that the booking has been rejected by the carrier
Indicates that the confirmed booking has been declined by the carrier
Indicates that the booking has been cancelled by the shipper
Indicates that the booking is complete and no more changes/amendments can be requested
